description: This source file demonstrates the use of the MCP protocol to coordinate a team of agents for travel planning, including defining data models, setting up agents with specific tools and instructions, and executing a team task to generate a travel itinerary.

classes.name: AirbnbListing
classes.description: Data model representing an Airbnb listing with optional address, price, available dates, and URL.

classes.name: Attraction
classes.description: Data model representing a travel attraction with optional rating, visit duration, and best time to visit.

classes.name: WeatherInfo
classes.description: Data model representing weather information including temperature, precipitation, and recommendations.

classes.name: TravelPlan
classes.description: Composite data model aggregating Airbnb listings, attractions, weather info, and suggested itinerary.

methods.name: run_team
methods.description: Asynchronous function that sets up environment, initializes agents and tools, creates a team, and executes a travel planning task.
